DocAttribute.Name: TaskId
DocAttribute.Documentation: An identifying designation given to a task.

DocAttribute.Name: Status
DocAttribute.Documentation: Current status of the task. NOTE: Particular values for status are not specified, these should be determined and agreed by local usage. Examples of possible status values include 'Not Yet Started', 'Started', 'Completed'.

DocAttribute.Name: WorkMethod
DocAttribute.Documentation: The method of work used in carrying out a task.

DocAttribute.Name: IsMilestone
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identifies whether a task is a milestone task (=TRUE) or not (= FALSE). NOTE: In small project planning applications, a milestone task may be understood to be a task having no duration. As such, it represents a singular point in time.

DocAttribute.Name: Priority
DocAttribute.Documentation: A value that indicates the relative priority of the task (in comparison to the priorities of other tasks).

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Restrict the relationship 'Nests' inherited from IfcObject to IfcRelNestsProcesses.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Restrict the relationship 'IsNestedBy' inherited from IfcObject to IfcRelNestsProcesses.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR3
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The Name attribute should be inserted to describe the task name.
